entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add a JSON schema exporting component for STJ contracts #102788
    9.0.0
  • Environment.FailFast in .NET 8 Container Yields Segmentation Fault (Exit Code 139) #102785
  • JIT generates suboptimal assembly code when using pattern matching #102781
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder writes incorrect type names to generated assembly for nested types #102777
  • SPMI Replay failing sporadically #102773
  • HttpIOException when establishing connection, unobserved task exception #102772
  • False positive test Interop/Interop/Interop.dll #102768
  • Patch skipping crashing in functions marked with [UnmanagedCallersOnly] #102767
  • Suggestion: make Process.StartInfo a best-effort API #102766
  • Filename/path encoding incorrectly causes file-not-found, when EnumerateFiles provided said file #102764
  • Widespread perf regressions due to RPO layout #102763
    9.0.0
  • [WASM][MT] fail: System.TypeLoadException: Could not resolve type with token #102762
    9.0.0
  • Issue with LDAP connection on RHEL\Rocky #102757
  • Android App crashes with abort_application() #102752
  • [browser][MT] JSMarshalerArgument.ToJSContext crashes with "ContextHandle not set" #102749
  • [browser] Migrate `wasmconsole` template to WebAssembly SDK #102743
    9.0.0
  • Corner case virtual method resolution bugs #102741
    Future

Closed

  • Passing a Stream Utf8JsonWriter to a JsonSerializer.Serialize method results in Pending bytes being misreported #66102
    9.0.0
  • EventPipe hangs with a shared NativeAOT library #89346
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add option to deseralize to private setters without explicitly annotation with `JsonIncludeAttribute` #102787
  • XmlSerializer.Deserialize fails when element contains XML content #102737
  • Problem when including the `corprof.h` file to use the Profiling API #102701
    9.0.0
  • ILLink: Trimmer and NativeAOT do not consider DoesNotReturnAttribute for diagnostics #102677
  • AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture no longer returns the correct result #77697
    7.0.x
  • Unexpected behavior when using ref structs in foreach loop #102665
  • Using PersistedAssemblyBuilder, TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride() throws NotSupportedException #102694
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.DynamicChainTests.BasicConstraints_ExceedMaximumPathLength #102358
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.ChainErrorsAtMultipleLayers #102359
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.InvalidSelfSignedSignature #102360
  • JIT: Some SIMD intrinsics operations don't reliably fold memory addressing logic #33002
    Future
  • LoggerMessage source generator does not work with logger from primary constructor. #91121
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: in place functions for TensorPrimitives #102761
  • `System.Text.Json` can't handle collection expressions in source gen mode #102746
  • [wasm] Tracking issue for build/bundler changes #70762
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SocketAsyncEventArgsTest.Connect_WithData_OK #102650
  • `optRemoveRedundantZeroInits` doesn't know about some safe points #102577
    9.0.0
  • Activator.CreateInstance<T> does not bring compile error or throw exception for required property #102734

PullRequests

Created

  • [Preview 5] Avoid new constraint with structs in ILLink analyzer #102790
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Connect align instruction after a label gets possibly added #102789
    NO-REVIEW
  • Fix incorrect metadata token written for array, pointer populated from TypeBuilder #102786
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Avoid new constraint with structs in ILLink analyzer #102784
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • LSRA: Make genRegMask() return `regMaskTP` #102783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add test for dataflow in local method group passed as argument to delegate #102782
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Don't trim members called by TypeDescriptor's use of reflection #102780
    area-System.Data
  • Backport #102613 to preview 5 #102778
    Servicing-consider, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • don't return ConnectOperation as we are not pooling it #102776
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Use alz3 images for all current Mariner images #102775
    area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid reporting new callstack chain on exceptions #102774
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Use floating tags for 1ES pt #102771
    needs-area-label
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2461953 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add support for Sve.StoreNonTemporal() #102769
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • NativeAOT/linux/arm: Fix native linux/arm failure #102760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve early returns for HashSet SubSet and SetEquals methods #102758
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Align reflection name formatting with CoreCLR-JIT #102756
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tweaks for renting buffer from the array pool in INumberBase #102755
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize allocations in HttpUtility.UrlDecodeToBytes for smaller inputs. #102753
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Don't query for negotiated ALPN protocol after renegotiation on Windows #102751
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add some more `#ifdef BACKGROUND_GC` to enable compilation for Wasm #102750
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][Apple] Use NSLocale.preferredLanguages on for default locale name #102748
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x
  • Use stackalloc char&byte arrays for decoding Url values in HttpUtiliy.ParseQueryString #102745
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • fix crossgen2determinism test #102742
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Periodically flush when using PipeWriter in Json #102541
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Bump prerelease version to 6 #102589
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update DIA to 17.10.0-beta1.24272.1 #102639
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • ILLink: Add test for event warning origin issue #102405
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [LoongArch64] Synchronize with PR#102592. #102711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Add support for primary constructors in LoggerMessageGenerator #101660
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-preview5] Use V5 ESRP task with backing MI + AKV #102674
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Fix inspect gchandle #102637
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix pri-1 test build breaks #102740
    needs-area-label
  • fix connect test extension #102668
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-bug
  • [RISC-V] Improve code generating resolve stub assembly #102318
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Conservative fix for struct stores in optRemoveRedundantZeroInits #102580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Improve Ascii.FromUtf16 and FromHexString #102735
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 9.0.0
  • Make CreateAppHost test use TestArtifact instead of its own class #102625
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Add ActivitySource Tags #102678
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fill in FeatureCheckDataflow.cs assertions with issue links #102679
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport 1ES templates #102681
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix config binding generator ValueType defaults #102733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Socket.DontFragment can't be set on IPv6 DualMode sockets #102700
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #102656
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Aging stacks #102415
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rewrite the corehost CMake system to be more "Modern CMake"y and less MSBuild-y #102475
    area-Host
  • Fix DispatchProxy throwing TypeLoadException for static virtual members #102718
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Make constructors private for parts of the ComInterfaceGenerator that should only be created from their static methods #101740
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Use new package for tracking SDK version number #102713
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update llvm-libunwind to v18 #102231
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SVE: Added `Load2xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load3xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load4xVectorAndUnzip` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Convert our CryptoKit bindings to use Swift structs at the boundary #102583
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • ILLink: Add EdgeVisitor and ITracingNode to enable logging dependency graph edges to illink dependency loggers #101949
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [cdac] Implement GetThreadStoreData in cDAC #102404
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix WhiteSpace validation in HttpHeaders #102693
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Align LA64 targetpacks with RV64 #102628
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add saturating decrement/increment by element count #102315
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [wasm] Disable downlevel tests for non-main branches in non-simple WasmBuildTests #102722
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Optimize "(vec & cns) == zero" on arm64 #102705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce `SwiftSelf<T>` and `SwiftIndirectResult` structs #102717
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102495
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix some comment typos #101232
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix SIMD12 spills #102736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adjust repro file message for merged test #102141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update the JIT to support rewriting more complex intrinsics as user calls #102702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Console.Unix: revert SetWindowSize implementation. #100272
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [browser] Allow downloading WebAssembly resources without performing other WebAssembly runtime initalization #102254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT][hybridglobalization] Run `HybridGlobalization` threading tests #102595
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • JSMarshalAs JSType Adjust comments and type parameters #101981
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Document the use of non-short-circuiting `|` operator in `Char::IsAsciiLetterOrDigit` #102547
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix SortedSet.InternalIndexOf 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add pseudoinstructions to disassembler #102260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
